projects.title: Snack Track
projects.description: Snack Track is an in-office snack purchasing web app that supports user transactions and inventory management. It provides employees, administrations and separate iPad modules. The project is sponsored by Galvanize

projects.title: Interline Reader
projects.description: Interline Reader is an interlingual learning website that for Korean course at UBC. A user is able to interact with text by text and improve theier learning experience

projects.title: Think Small
projects.description: ThinkSmall is a community volunteer and small business owners matching platform. Small business owners who have a need for services (such as the creation of the logo, and translation for flyers) are able to find volunteers who have the skillset to help them.

projects.title: Champ
projects.description: Wone the 1st place from Hack4Health. Champ is a commmunity challenge app designed to help people reach goals and build healthy habits.

projects.title: Goodgredient
projects.description: Won the Popular Prize from nwHacks2021. Goodgredients provides a simple way to check the toxicity of certain chemicals in them on your body and to the environment. Simply take a picture of your Shampoo or body wash and check which ingredient might harmful to you.

projects.title: Greener Shopper
projects.description: Wone the 3rd place from SAP iXP Hack4Good. The GreenerShopper is your greener shopping helper Chrome extension. When going through items on amazon.ca, the extension provides us calculation of the kilograms of CO2 emissions that is put into making and shipping this product.

projects.title: Finance Hero
projects.description: Won the MLH Blockstack Award from cmd-f2020. Finance Hero helps users get familiar with finance, and even better, it's a fun game everyone can enjoy!

projects.title: Sales View
projects.description: Won the SAP Analystics Champion from nwHacks2020. SalesView is a data visualization tool. Users can post their data, see graphical analysis and statistics.
